name: show
description:
NAME
SHOW - display list of created graphs or nothing if none exist

SYNOPSIS
SHOW [-h]
SHOW -a
SHOW graphname_1 [graphname_n...]

DESCRIPTION
SHOW displays either all graphs in memory or specific graphs by name. With no arguments, shows nothing if no graphs exist.

COMMAND-LINE OPTIONS
-h, --help - option that shows this text.
-a, --all - show all graphs in memory.
